spec_data.Name: libgomp-offload-nvptx
spec_data.License: GPLv3+ and GPLv3+ with exceptions and GPLv2+ with exceptions and LGPLv2+ and BSD
spec_data.Description:
This package contains libgomp plugin for offloading to NVidia
PTX.  The plugin needs libcuda.so.1 shared library that has to be
installed separately.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 16 Sep 2017 10:09:35 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: GCC OpenMP v4.5 plugin for offloading to NVPTX
